thread.title: Shahid Kapoor 'very sad' Alia Bhatt working without him in other films
thread.title_full: Shahid Kapoor 'very sad' Alia Bhatt working without him in other films - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Shahid Kapoor 'very sad' Alia Bhatt working without him in other films
text:
Actor Shahid Kapoor , who will be working with Alia Bhatt in back-to-back films, is "very sad" that afterwards she will be working with other actors in different films.*Alia Bhatt and Shahid Kapoor*
"'Shaandaar' is a relevant film in our career, which Alia and I often discuss about. The kind of films that I'm doing - my last ... Â»
